com.ibm.jikes.skij
Class Evaluator

java.lang.Object
  |

public class Evaluator
extends Object

This class handles the evaluation of Scheme expressions.

Field Detail

topEnv

public Environment topEnv

saveMacroSource

public static boolean saveMacroSource
If true, the original code for macros is saved, so that procedures when printed look like they do when defined. If false (the default), the original code is discarded and replaced with the expansion.

saveTailCalls

public static boolean saveTailCalls
If true, tail-call elimination is turned off. This can produce more meaningul backtraces (but can also cause stack overflow).
Constructor Detail

Evaluator

public Evaluator(SchemeListener l)
Method Detail

eval

public Object eval(Object exp)            throws SchemeException
Evaluate exp in the top environment.

eval

public static Object eval(Object exp,                          Environment env)                   throws SchemeException
Evaluate exp in the context of env.
